attributes.additional_details: Women should be able to defend themselves from being attacked . Legalising pepper spray could stop so many women from being sexually assaulted or murdered.
attributes.background: Women and girls should be able to defend themselves in our country. Coming and going to work or college in winter months in the dark can be scary for women  travelling alone. Pepper spray could save so many women’s lives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legalise pepper spray in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742673
